description: 從零開始構建並成功上線博物館藏品主題資料庫，向公眾開放使用。
代表博物館與外部團隊協作，規劃資料庫需求功能和實物藏品數位化流程，設計 Metadata 欄位及撰寫規範，並構思資料之間的關聯與叢集。
為解決客製化資料無法被現有系統儲存的問題，提出後台簡易功能的規劃，成功整合資料儲存、客製化編輯與展示應用三個介面。
info_zh.nature: 博物館與外部團隊合作開發的正式產品
info_zh.role: 博物館方資料庫內容企劃、日常營運

description: A new museum collection database made for the public
Planned the process to digitize items and wrote rules for metadata fields
Thought about how the data is connected
To solve the problem of custom data not being saved by the old system, planned a simple backend to store, edit, and show the data
info_en.nature: A formal product developed by the museum and outside team
info_en.role: Museum's database planner and daily operations

description: SNS 社交平台。
採用前後端分離架構及遠端協作，在 14 天內完成開發，期間進行多次迭代。
前端使用 React，支援RWD，使用axios介接後端資料。
注重使用者體驗與互動，透過增設事件處理中的 UI 回饋變化，協助使用者清楚掌握當前處理狀態。
除前端開發外，撰寫與檢核 acceptance criteria list。
info_zh.nature: 前後端分離的團隊協作（進修課程畢業門檻）

description: Social media platform
Finished in 14 days with frontend and backend separate and team working remotely, improved with many demos
Frontend uses React, supports RWD
Used axios to connect with backend data
Focused on user experience and interaction, added user tips during event handling, UI changes help users understand what is happening
Wrote an acceptance criteria list and did testing
info_en.nature: Teamwork with frontend and backend separate (graduation project for a course)

description: 選舉開票與分析平台，結合政府open data真實選票與模擬候選人，以視覺化呈現多種選情分析。
chart.js 繪製歷屆選票分析圖表。
客製化 Bootstrap，支援 RWD。
選票分析中因行政區升級導致部分地名無法比對，以身份證英文代碼和郵遞區號作為識別碼獲得解決。
與協作者討論 git flow 及 git conflict 解決方式。
info_zh.highlights: 2023 THE F2E 黑客松團體組入選（團隊：匿名山羌）

description: Election results and analysis platform, combining real government open data with simulated candidates
Used chart.js to make charts of past election votes
Customized Bootstrap, supports RWD
Solved the problem of matching place names due to area upgrades by using ID code and postal code as identifiers
Discussed git flow and how to fix git conflicts with teammates
info_en.highlights: The project was selected for The F2E 2024 group category (team: Incognito Formosan Muntjac).

description: 自然步道為主題的個人筆記與檢索平台。
使用axios介接兩種政府open data APIs 與現成 To-Do-List APIs。
具有會員註冊與CRUD功能，使用Pinia管理。
chart.js繪製會員個人化足跡分析圖表。
規劃多樣主題檢索，從角色、功能分類，引導使用者以需求探索步道。
除蒐藏待辦步道外，透過JSON轉換格式，將既有 API 儲存單一字串值的限制轉換為多值儲存，實現會員評論功能。
A personal notes and search platform focused on nature trails
Used axios to connect to two government open data APIs and a To-Do List API
User registration and CRUD features, managed with Pinia
Made personal trail charts with chart.js
Customized Bootstrap, supports RWD
Used Sass (SCSS) with BEM rules
Various search themes, guiding users to explore trails by role or function
Added a comment feature by changing JSON format to store more values, beyond just saving trails
